name: Polar Panic (itch)
description:
Polar Panic is a game created at Eko Game Jam 2019 (14.-16.6.2019 Helsinki).

Use arrow keys to move your polar bear around and eat seals.  Seals at open sea are hard (impossible) to catch.

Click CO2 bubbles to remove emissions before they hit ice rafts.

Team:
Annakaisa Kultima: code and design
Ilona Mettiäinen: graphics, design and science
Keith Davis: audio
Lauri Leskinen: video
